thread.title: Grammys 2017 host James Corden 'fakes' technical glitch | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017 host James Corden 'fakes' technical glitch | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Grammys 2017 host James Corden 'fakes' technical glitch | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad 'This is a disaster!' James Corden 'fakes' technical glitch in slapstick start to the Grammys before taking the stage in his underwear The Late Late Show host stumbled and fumbled and ended up rolling down steps to make it onto the stage with one shoe missing 'This is the Grammys, people! We can't allow these sort of mistakes,' he ranted in mock frustration before ordering his dancers off stage After Twenty One Pilots accepted their Grammy in their boxer shorts, Corden appeared on stage in his underpants The British funnyman also orchestrated an epic Carpool Karaoke live with JLo, Neil Diamond, Keith Urban, Tim McGraw, Faith Hill, John Legend and Jason Derulo Published: 01:19 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 11:03 GMT, 13 February 2017 296 shares
